backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing a personal finance app with user profiles, transactions, spending limits, challenges, referrals, leaderboard, and PIN verification, using access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Trivial migration module that passes old actor state through unchanged, used for actor syntax migration with no actual state transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (promotional carousel, PIN balance check, spending limits summary, etc.) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON index of all frontend source files with one-line descriptions of each component, page, hook, and utility in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the FinMate React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router with all page routes, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, inactivity timer, and profile setup modal gating.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsChatbot: Analytics AI chatbot card component that accepts transactions and spending limits, maintaining chat message state and generating responses via generateAnalyticsInsight.
frontend/src/components/BalanceRevealCar: Gradient card component that fetches and displays the user's bank balance with a dismiss button, shown after successful PIN verification.
Displays the user's available bank balance in a styled card with a toggle to show/hide the balance value, using the useBalance hook and a skeleton loader while fetching.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with five route links (Home, History, Analytics, Challenges, Profile), highlighting the active route using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/CategorySpending: Renders a Recharts pie chart visualizing spending amounts broken down by category, with a fallback message when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/ChallengesLeader: Shows a preview card combining up to two active challenges (with a complete button) and the top-3 leaderboard entries, with skeleton loading states and links to full pages.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Provides a scrollable chat UI that displays user and bot messages and includes a text input form for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/FinancialHealthS: Displays a radial bar chart alongside a label and score representing the user's financial health, calculated from transactions, balance, spending limits, and challenges.
frontend/src/components/InactivityWarnin: Shows a modal dialog warning the user of an impending session timeout due to inactivity, displaying a countdown and a button to stay logged in.
frontend/src/components/IncomeExpenseCha: Renders a Recharts bar chart comparing total income versus total expenses for a given period.
frontend/src/components/InsightCards.tsx: Generates and displays a grid of AI-driven insight cards (warning, success, or info) derived from transactions and spending limits using the analyticsInsights utility.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with a sticky gradient header containing the FinMate logo, a centered content area rendering child routes via Outlet, and the BottomNavigation component.
frontend/src/components/LinkedBankAccoun: Displays the user's linked bank account (masked number) in a card and provides a button to navigate to the bank-linking page to manage or add an account.
frontend/src/components/NotificationSett: Renders a settings card with toggles for four notification preference types, persisting changes via the useSaveNotificationPreferences hook.
frontend/src/components/PaymentForm.tsx: A form component for submitting debit or credit transactions, allowing users to enter amount, category, and description with payment method support.
frontend/src/components/PinVerificationM: A modal dialog for PIN setup and verification, supporting 6-digit PIN entry with lockout logic after failed attempts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileHeader.ts: Displays the user's avatar (with initials and color based on name), name, and an editable phone number field stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A one-time setup modal that prompts new users to enter their name and initializes their profile via the save profile hook.
frontend/src/components/PromotionalAdsCa: An auto-advancing carousel displaying five promotional ad cards (budgeting, loans, investments, credit score, student savings) with manual navigation controls.
A circular button that opens the QRScannerModal or delegates to a custom onClick handler when provided.
frontend/src/components/QRScannerModal.t: A modal with tabs for QR scan (placeholder UI) and phone number payment, both rendering the PaymentForm component.
frontend/src/components/QuickActions.tsx: Renders a three-button grid for quick actions: Recharge (navigates to /recharge), Train Tickets (shows coming-soon toast), and Send Money (calls a callback).
frontend/src/components/SpendingLimitsSu: Displays a summary card of up to 4 spending limits with progress bars, warning/over-limit indicators, and links to the spending limits page. Shows skeletons while loading and an empty state if no limits are set.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionPlan: Renders a card showing the user's current subscription plan (Free tier) with a Crown icon and an Upgrade button that triggers a coming-soon toast.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook, displaying a Sun or Moon icon accordingly.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: A top navigation bar showing a time-based greeting with the user's name/initials, a notification bell with badge count, and a theme toggle button.
Renders a list of transactions with category icons, timestamps, and amounts; optionally allows inline category editing via a dropdown menu using the useUpdateTransactionCategory hook.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyComparison: Displays a grouped bar chart comparing debit spending by category between the current week and the previous week using Recharts.
frontend/src/data/categories.ts: Exports a readonly array of transaction category strings and a corresponding TypeScript type.
frontend/src/data/offers.ts: Exports a static array of promotional offer objects with discount codes, categories, and expiry dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddTransaction.ts: Provides a mutation hook to add a transaction via the backend actor, invalidating transactions and balance queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Fetches the caller's account balance from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useChallenges.ts: Fetches the list of challenges from the backend actor using React Query.
Provides a mutation hook to mark a challenge as complete, showing a success toast and invalidating challenges and user profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetBankAccount.ts: Fetches the caller's linked bank account string from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Fetches the authenticated caller's user profile from the backend actor, merging actor-fetching state into the loading flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInactivityTimer.ts: Tracks user inactivity and automatically logs out after 5 minutes of no activity, showing a warning in the final 60 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: React Query hook that fetches the leaderboard entries from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinVerification.ts: Hook managing PIN verification and setup with SHA-256 hashing, rate-limiting via attempt tracking, and a lockout countdown timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty placeholder file indicating queries are split into individual hook files.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferrals.ts: React Query hook that fetches the list of referral Principals from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook that saves a user profile to the backend and invalidates the currentUserProfile query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveNotificationPr: Mutation hook that persists notification preferences to localStorage (as a backend workaround) and exposes a helper to retrieve stored preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetBankAccount.ts: Mutation hook that sets a bank account number via the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetSpendingLimit.t: Mutation hook that sets a spending limit for a given category via the backend actor and invalidates spending limit queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpendingLimits.ts: React Query hook that fetches the list of spending limits from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Hook that manages light/dark theme state, persists it to localStorage, and applies the appropriate CSS class to the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: React Query hook that fetches transactions from the backend actor, optionally filtered by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTransactionC: Mutation hook that overrides a transaction's category by storing the mapping in localStorage as a workaround for missing backend support.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/components/utilities, CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH colors, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics page component displaying financial health score, income/expense and category spending charts, weekly comparisons, AI insights, and a chatbot, all filtered by a selectable time period.
frontend/src/pages/BankLinkingPage.tsx: Page for linking or updating a bank account, displaying the currently linked account (masked) and a form to submit a new account number using the useSetBankAccount hook.
frontend/src/pages/ChallengesPage.tsx: Page showing active financial challenges with progress and a complete button, the user's digi points balance, and a top-10 leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/ChatbotPage.tsx: Page hosting a rule-based AI chatbot interface that responds to user messages with budgeting advice via the getBudgetingResponse utility.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Transaction history page with period (weekly/monthly/yearly), category, and text search filters, plus a CSV export button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing a promotional carousel, PIN-gated balance reveal, QR scanner, quick actions, spending limits summary, challenges preview, and recent transactions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with an animated FinMate logo and a single Internet Identity authentication button, showing a loading state during login.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Page displaying active student discount offers filtered by expiry date, each showing discount percentage, description, category badge, expiry, and promo code.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders the user profile page with sections for profile header, linked bank account, subscription plan, notification settings, and menu items (referral, offers, security), plus a logout button that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/pages/RechargePage.tsx: Provides a mobile recharge UI where users enter a phone number, select an operator, choose a predefined plan, and submit a simulated recharge with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralPage.tsx: Displays the user's referral code (derived from their Internet Identity principal), allows copying or sharing it, and lists existing referrals fetched via the useReferrals hook.
frontend/src/pages/SpendingLimitsPage.ts: Allows users to set monthly spending limits per category and displays progress bars comparing current month's debit totals against each configured limit.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsCalculations: Provides helper functions to aggregate debit transactions by category and to compute total income vs. total expense from a transaction list.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsInsights.ts: Generates an array of insight cards (overspending alerts, subscription review, savings rate, month-over-month comparison) based on transactions and spending limits for a given period.
frontend/src/utils/chatResponses.ts: Returns canned financial advice responses for a simple rule-based chatbot, matching keywords like 'save', 'budget', 'expense', 'challenge', and 'limit'.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Converts a list of transactions to a CSV file and triggers a browser download with a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/dateFilters.ts: Provides utility functions to filter an array of Transactions by weekly (7-day), monthly (30-day), or yearly (365-day) time periods relative to the current date.
Calculates a composite financial health score (0â€“100) with a label and color based on savings rate, spending limit adherence, and challenge completion, weighted 40/40/20.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive parameters from the URL hash without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that enables dark mode via class, maps CSS variable-based design tokens to color/radius/font utilities, and registers the animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall FinMate project state (version 11), including architectural notes, known issues, image requirements, and a list of implemented features for this mobile budgeting and payment app.
